title: Bug 4329 - No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
SR: This is not found when searching for declarations. Search via context menu in the packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name. NOTES:
